name: Sandals Royal Caribbean Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007
reviews.text: On arrival shown to room. Very diapointed,as i had booked the holiday to celebrate our 33rd wedding annerversy and my wifes birthday. The room was very tired to say the least. Late night partie's on the beech outside our room did not help matters.
reviews.title: hated it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We requested a room away from the noise, none where availibale. With the out side dinning moved inside, due to rain. 1 1/2 hour waits for the inside dinning Rain come through the light fittings The last straw was when our hot water ran out.
reviews.title: Honeymoon

likes.liked: — everything was close together, didn't have to walk a great distance to get anywhere.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: These and other matters resulted in us requesting to go home.
reviews.title: Had a really nice time

likes.liked: — the all inclusive resort, two thumbs up
likes.disliked: — some buildings look a little tired, the jets taking off

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were then moved to the White House (For 6 nights) then to Sandals near dunns river ( For 4 nights). Both for a lot better than the royal caribbean. Pity we wasted 4 nights there and two days packing and moving.
reviews.title: Overrated, never go back.
Loved the Island!!
reviews.text: On the up side. The pool was great the staff most polite and helpful. Food average , Beech clean,

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.text: My husband & I stayed for the first time at SRC from 3/7 to 3/14/09 and really loved it. Our first Sandals trip was in 2006 to Whitehouse which we also loved, but we are thinking if we had to choose we would go to SRC over Whitehouse. After reading mostly great reviews on Trip Advisor, it was the few bad reviews I was worried about, and now I think those people must just be very difficult to please.

reviews.title: Another Great Visit to Royal
reviews.text: The weather was on the cool side (low 70's) and very windy, but it seemed to be getting warmer as the week went on. We had no trouble with mosquitoes, and that could be because the wind kept them away.

reviews.title: A Slice of Paradise!
reviews.text: We were upgraded to a River Suite room which was gorgeous and immaculate. We made reservations right when we arrived and were able to get them for Le Jardenier, the Thai, and the Italian restaurant at Sandals Montego Bay, but the days and times were already "picked over," so we had to take what was available. We loved all the restaurants - the food was so much better than I thought it would be. I did hear there is a new chef overseeing everything so that could be why. Food at Cricketeers was just okay although it seemed like a fun place to socialize later in the evening. We went to the Sandals returnee dinner which was excellent and a nice place to meet other couples.

reviews.title: Great For Some Winter Sun
reviews.text: The staff was very friendly, some more than others, and the resort was very well maintained with beautiful flowers,and there were peacocks walking around. Although Whitehouse is more spread out with a much nicer beach, we liked how at SRC everything is pretty central, and food and drink are readily available wherever you may be. The beach is small, but we didn't ever have a problem getting chairs. There is a great little beach bar which was convenient. The chicken wraps were very good there.

reviews.title: Not what we expected
reviews.text: We met some great couples there - hello to Rich & Rita, Ava and Bryce, and Karen & Glenn. It was hard getting back to reality after being pampered for a week, but our batteries are now recharged, and we are thinking of planning another trip here in the not too distant future.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just had our third visit to Sandals Royal Carribean. Once you have visisted you will definitely become a return guest. My husband and I vacation three times per year, and every year we return to Sandals Royal Carribean. There is just no better place to vacation.
reviews.title: The perfect vacation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service and the attention that you receive from the staff from check in until checkout is wonderful. They manage not to be ever present and overbearing, but there to accommodate any need you may have. In fact, they accommodate needs you did not realize that you had. The entire staff, from the Director of Guest Service to the bellmen, is very warm and friendly. It is a shame that you are not allowed to tip them, as they deserve it. We love everything about Sandals Royal Carribean, but the service the staff provide alone would be enough to keep you coming back.
reviews.title: The best trip we've taken!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The entire experience is wonderful. The accommodations are always great, always clean and very up to date. This year we stayed in a new Swim up River Suite and the room was fabulous. Actually the accommondations were absolutely unbelievable. The food is always great in each of the restaurants and the restaurant hours are such that there is always a nice place to have a great meal at anytime.
reviews.title: Great Honeymoon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The entertainment provides something for everyone. There are various activities throughout the day for the active type and various entertainment provided for those who prefer the less active events such as board games, pool and ping pong. The activity staff does a great job of providing activities throughtout the day, as well as, all of the great entertainment provided during the evenings.
reviews.title: We loved it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Sandals Royal Carribean is the perfect vacation resort !
reviews.title: Sandals Royal Caribbean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived at Sandals Royal Caribbean on Dec. 3rd and left on Dec. 11th. We were at the Montego Bay airport for a short time on Dec. 3rd. After getting through customs fairly quick, we were wisked away to the Sandals lounge to wait for the shuttle to take us to the resort. I couldn't even finish my first free beer and we were off. Driving to the resort the surrounding area is very poor and the road construction is absolutely awful!!! Though, once we pulled up to the resort, all was forgotten, everything from the outside looked great. Within another couple mintues we had a chilled towel and a glass of wine waiting for our room key. We had booked a royal premium room and were told that we were going to get upgraded, so we were very excited!! Once we got to the room, our hearts sank to the floor. The room looked like a camp cabin. Tiny window A/C unit, no glass windows, just wooden slats that closed, the bathoom was worse or the same as a low end Holiday Inn, and the safe was all rusted. As the bellboy finished dropping our luggage off he said "Is there anything else I can do for you", while swatting mosquitos from his face, in the room mind you!!! We were very upset with the room, especially since it was an upgrade. Anyways, we talked to the office and got a much better and nicer room, with the low low price of $80 more a night, but it was well worth it. The new room was really nice, big bed, big shower, mini-bar, and mini-fridge, stocked everyday. Everything else during our trip was pretty good. Here are the details:
reviews.title: Great Honeymoon, but resort needs some work.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Bars:
reviews.title: INCREDIBLE! Best Vacation EVER!

likes.liked: — The staff, the service, the decor, the easy-going attitude, the drinks!
likes.disliked: — There were minor glitches, but nothing that I really

reviews.title: Wonderful Experience
reviews.text: Only one pool bar and one beach bar. No long lines for drinks and drinks were very stiff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled on business
reviews.text: Pools:
reviews.title: Wanted to go home as soon as I saw our room
Awesome Vacation!!!
reviews.text: There were three pools, all very small and very cool. There are also two hot tubs. Pretty crowded around the main pool everyday. Looks like the pools only get cleaned once a week. By Saturday, the main pool was so dirty, we didn't even want to get into it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from 7 nights at SRC, travelled with Virgin via Gatwick. the flight was on time and ok. Got through the airport quickly, a quick beer in the lounge then off. The red hat guy was very pushy but he got a tip. we were quickly in our room 410 on the South block over looking the small pool, this was perfect for us, very quiet.
reviews.title: Yeh Man !!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent two days on the island, 2 on the beach/big pool (bit noisy for us) and 2 days by our pool (as we were only here for 7 nights we did not want to go out, just relax). The food was great, our fav was the tye (spelling ?) on the island, our least fav was the French.
reviews.title: Jamaica the easy way !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The best for Lunch for us was the beach place, the buffet at lunch on the island was a bit boreing.
reviews.title: Beautiful Honeymoon Suite for our 20th Anniversary and ROYAL TREATMENT!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Service and staff were great, everybody says hi and most have alaugh and joke for you.
reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic, going straight back!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a bit of a chat with ian the GM, he was great for us (but we herd others moaning about him) I have his E mail if anyone wants it.
reviews.title: Not quite what I was expecting! An expensive Butlins

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We traveled the first week in November and the resort was beautiful. But first the bad.
reviews.title: Great Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When you book this resort you are under the impression that tipping is not allowed. This is far from the truth. Although the employees wear buttons that say "Don't tip me" when they find out your are leaving, they turn it on. Showing you pictures of their kids, asking to help them out. Now it wasnt everyone at the resort, mainly the bartenders. It got to the point where we didnt want to go into the bar because is was so uncomfortable being around theses people 'asking for a tip'. It was a real turn off and reuined our evening with friends one night. Sure we tip back here in the states, but dont sell me a resort where tipping is prohibited and wear a button telling me not to tip you and then ask for a tip. We eventually caved in and tipped a few people.
reviews.title: horrible

likes.liked: — terrace onto small quiet pool area and room service
likes.disliked: — aircraft noise and hotel bulding and holiday camp atmosphere

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We tipped the maid $2 daily
reviews.title: Royal Fraud!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Now the good.
reviews.title: Fabulous Vacation

likes.disliked: — Nothing! (maybe, liquid sunshine, but that's not avoidable!!)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The grounds were clean and beautiful and the new pub was fun. The room was clean, on the second floor overlooking a pool up front by reception, not sure what the name of the building was. The private island was great, very quiet, but not enough chairs around the pool for everyone. The pool and hot tub on the island was open, but a little dirty and the bar was open also. The beach on the island is clean but small and we enjoyed the piece and quite there.
reviews.title: Loved every minute
The Best place in Montego Bay
reviews.text: Well my husband & I went back to the Royal Caribbean for the 13th time for our Anniversary February 23 thru March 5, 2009. We were married there & go back every year. The Staff is the Best you will find. Some are still there since we have been going Like Leighton Josephs the Guest Services Director, he is the Best & will go out of his way to make sure Everything is the Best it can be. Thank you Nicky-Ann the Concierge Manager & Her Staff for making our Anniversary Perfect. Iain McCormack the General Manager and Rick Burrows the Assistant Manager are always walking the property & talking to the guests to make sure everything is going well with there stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: The Restraunts are fine, the Lunch buffet at the Regency still needs improvement but it has gotten better than last year. Its great to see people that have returned for as long as we have.
reviews.title: Great Vacation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: The bartenders are great, Siegard, Tracy-Ann, Ernest, Albert & of Course Verna at the pool bar. Keep up the Good Work Jason with your bar staff, you will be Fine as the New Bar Manager!!!
reviews.title: fantastic hotel, staff and facilities-just beware its under the flight path

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Antonio is back after many years as the Entertainment Manager (use to be a playmaker back in the days with Leighton 1998)
reviews.title: Some great things, some good things and a very few things to be aware of

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Go to the Royal it is a small resort but VERY PERSONABLE the staff calls you by your name & will remember you.
reviews.title: Enjoyed the vacation!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we just got back and had to write if you are planning to go to sandals
reviews.title: great place
Relaxing Get-a-way
reviews.text: royal do not think twice go its a nice place it shows they have spent some big money renewing the place, the new pub is agreat idea, the food is good in all restaurants, its grounds are well kept but your vacation will get a boost from the staff from the front with joseph and marlon to all the guys at cricketeers pub to the beach with chris, niel, dwight. iam a signature guest for the first time at sanals royal and they all made us at home, tuesday we had close friends come and spend the day with us mickey from sandals ocho rios and homa from sandals golf course it rained all day but we had agreat time the pub was agreat place to drink eat and have agreat time thank

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: you so much all at sandals royal and if you read any bad reviews on this resort iam sorry idid not see any thing that would stop me from going back to this resort
reviews.title: not the best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled on business
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at Sandals RC for my 40th birthday. this was our second trip to this property. As usual the stafff was wonderful, very eager to make your stay wonderful and memorable. The only disappointed was the menus in the 5 restaurants do not change as often has they had the last visit. Only had one meal that we felt was not up to Sandals standard, this was probably due to an unexpected rain shower which forced some of the other outside restaurants to close. It took 2 hours to get through a 4 course meal. There had been many renovations and improvements to the property, which was very nice. Our room was huge, very clean and maintained daily. Our housekeeper left fresh flowers in our room each day. Our in room mini bar was restocked daily and we were asked what items we wanted in our fridge replaced . We had a honeymoon conciererge room, which included 24 hour room service, but we never used it, but it was available. The shower in this room was enormous!! The beachfront views were gorgeous. Some sections of the beaches at RC were at times, empty. You could have the beach all to yourself at times or at least very few people, if any. The water sports/ beach bar and grill sections was much more crowded.
reviews.title: Not what I expected

likes.disliked: — not enough beach to walk on

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I do highly recommend taking advantage of the restaurants at the other nearby Sandals properties. The OK Corral at Montego Bay was awesome (great steaks)!! We were only about 10 minutes from teh airport, but when we left, we were given juice and a snack for the road. You definitely will no go hungry at any of the Sandals resorts!! We had a great experience, and are ready to book another trip!!
reviews.title: We love SRC.......

likes.liked: — Close to the airport, smaller resort, beautiful room, great food, friendly staff
likes.disliked: — Only complaint this trip was lack of internet service being available

aka: Sandals Royal Caribbean Hotel Montego Bay
description: •7 exquisite dining options, with world-class culinary cuisines.•Only Jamaican resort with a private offshore island, housing an authentic Thai restaurant.•Magnificent, swim-up crystal lagoon suites.•24 hour room service as a part of our concierge service.•English pub offering an authentic pub dining experience.•Voted Sandals “World's Leading All-Inclusive Company” 16 years in a row.•Voted “Caribbean's Leading Hotel Brand” 18 years in a row.
